mapper.select: SELECT C.COLLEGE_NO, C.COLLEGE_NAME, COUNT(D.DEPARTMENT_NO) AS DCOUNT FROM COLLEGE C LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON C.COLLEGE_NO = D.COLLEGE_NO GROUP BY C.COLLEGE_NO, C.COLLEGE_NAME ORDER BY C.COLLEGE_NO
SELECT DEPARTMENT_NO, DEPARTMENT_NAME, DEPARTMENT_TUITION, DGR_NO, COLLEGE_NO, DEPARTMENT_DESC, DEL_YN FROM DEPARTMENT WHERE COLLEGE_NO=#{colleageNo}
